execution_quality: The agent methodically explored the codebase, documented findings, and presented a clear implementation plan, though it ultimately deferred execution decisions to the user rather than proceeding with implementation.
work_category: Planning and architectural investigation task where the agent entered plan mode to explore the codebase structure and design a refactoring strategy for unifying shopping and pantry treeview systems.
summary: The agent successfully entered plan mode and conducted a thorough investigation of the shopping and pantry components to understand their treeview implementations. It created a detailed plan document outlining the refactoring approach to unify these systems while respecting their different requirements, demonstrating good alignment with the user's intent to avoid previous mistakes. The work was well-organized and clearly communicated, though execution was intentionally deferred pending user approval of the plan.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without user response - likely the user is reviewing the plan or will continue in a new session with implementation work.
